title: KDA Formula
body:
What is the kda formula?

Websites like; Lol DataBase, lolking and oce.op.gg all seem to follow ((K + a) x 2) / D

Is this the actual formula?

replies.body:
(K+A)/D 

2/3/6= 2.66 kda
4/1/0= 4 kda
11/13/0= 0.85 kda
2.00 or higher is usually a good kda

Actually the formula op.gg uses is (K+A)/D. I have no idea what formula LoL Database uses, but I can tell it's not the one you listed. As far as I'm aware lolking doesn't use any, it just lists the K/D/A. Another formula that people use is [K+(A/2)]/D. As far as I'm aware there's no "official" formula for K/D/A.
